long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ace your technical interviews with ease! The NextOffer Chrome extension helps you tackle coding challenges in real-time. During an interview session, simply click the button to take a screenshot of the coding question on your current tab, and let the NextOffer AI Assistant solve it for you automatically.

Whether you need assistance with coding solutions or just want to verify your approach, this extension integrates seamlessly with the NextOffer platform, providing instant support to help you succeed.
